recommendations.name: docsmsft.docs-authoring-pack
recommendations.description: Provides Markdown authoring assistance for content on Microsoft Learn, including support for basic Markdown syntax as well as custom Markdown syntax like alerts, code snippets, and non-localizable text. Now also includes some basic YAML authoring assistance, such as inserting TOC entries.

recommendations.name: markdownlint
recommendations.description: A popular Markdown linter by David Anson to help make sure your Markdown is valid.

recommendations.name: Code Spell Checker
recommendations.description: A fully offline spell checker by Street Side Software.

recommendations.name: Learn Preview
recommendations.description: Uses the Microsoft Learn CSS for more accurate Markdown preview, including custom Markdown.

recommendations.name: Learn Article Templates
recommendations.description: Allows users to scaffold Learn modules and apply Markdown skeleton content to new files.

recommendations.name: Learn YAML
recommendations.description: Provides YAML schema validation and auto-complete.

recommendations.name: Learn Images
recommendations.description: Provides image compression and resizing for folders and individual files to help authors of Microsoft Learn content.
